languages.text: "Помните внутреннюю миссию Адептус Арбитес, на которую он не так давно отправился? Насколько я знаю, она была провалена, в связи с чем господин Антар был сочтен недостойным своего ранга и служения вам".

"Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."
languages.original_text: "Помните внутреннюю миссию Адептус Арбитес, на которую он не так давно отправился? Насколько я знаю, она была провалена, в связи с чем господин Антар был сочтен недостойным своего ранга и служения вам".

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

"Do you remember the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

"Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

"Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

"Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

languages.text: 「少し前に彼が参加した高等裁定局内部の任務を覚えておられますか？私の知る限り、あの任務は失敗に終わりました。それが原因でマスター・アンサールはその階級にふさわしくないと判断され、あなたに仕える資格もないとされたのです」
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: 「少し前に彼が参加した高等裁定局内部の任務を覚えておられますか？私の知る限り、あの任務は失敗に終わりました。それが原因でマスター・アンサールはその階級にふさわしくないと判断され、あなたに仕える資格もないとされたのです」

languages.text: "Kendisinin yakın zamanda gerçekleştirdiği Adeptus Arbites vazifesini hatırlıyor musunuz? Bildiğim kadarıyla başarısız oldu ve bunun neticesinde Üstat Anthar'ın rütbesine, dolayısıyla da size hizmet etmeye layık olmadığına karar verildi."
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Kendisinin yakın zamanda gerçekleştirdiği Adeptus Arbites iç görevini hatırlıyor musunuz? Bildiğim kadarıyla bu görev başarısızlıkla sonuçlandı ve bunun neticesinde Üstat Anthar'ın rütbesine ve dolayısıyla da size hizmet etmeye layık olmadığına karar verildi."

languages.text: «¿Recuerda la misión interna para el Adeptus Arbites que emprendió no hace mucho? Por lo que sé, terminó en fracaso, lo que hizo que se considerara al maestro Anthar indigno del cargo y de servirle».
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda la misión interna para el Adeptus Arbites que emprendió no hace mucho? Por lo que sé, terminó en fracaso, lo que hizo que se considerara al maestro Anthar indigno del cargo y de servirle».

languages.text: “您还记得不久前，法务部派他去执行某项内部行动吗？据我所知，那场行动以失败告终。法务部认为安萨大师不配继续担任监察官一职，也不配继续为您服务。”
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: “您还记得不久前，法务部派他去执行某项内部行动吗？据我所知，那场行动以失败告终。法务部认为安萨大师不配继续担任监察官一职，也不配继续为您服务。”

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez de la mission interne que l'Adeptus Arbites lui a confiée il y a peu ? Pour autant que je sache, ce fut un échec, si bien que maître Anthar a été jugé indigne de son grade et inapte à vous servir. »
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez de la mission interne que l'Adeptus Arbites lui a confiée il y a peu ? Pour autant que je sache, ce fut un échec, si bien que maître Anthar a été jugé indigne de son grade et inapte à vous servir. »

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die interne Mission des Adeptus Arbites, mit der er vor nicht allzu langer Zeit betraut war? Meines Wissens war sie ein Fehlschlag, woraufhin Meister Anthar seines Ranges und des Dienstes für Eure Wenigkeit für unwürdig befunden wurde."
languages.original_text: "Do you recall the internal Adeptus Arbites mission he went on not so long ago? As far as I know, it was a failure, which led to Master Anthar being deemed unworthy of his rank and unfit to serve you."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die interne Mission des Adeptus Arbites, mit der er vor nicht allzu langer Zeit betraut war? Meines Wissens war sie ein Fehlschlag, woraufhin Meister Anthar seines Ranges und des Dienstes für Eure Wenigkeit für unwürdig befunden wurde."
